name: The Anticlimactic Adventures Of Bob
description:
I made this game a couple years ago on an unstable version of game maker on mac and finally remade it all for windows!!!

Description:

Take The role of a guy called Bob. you wake up in the middle of nowhere forest place not remembering a thing, you meet a guy that you soon realise to be yo dad. Soon a hooded dude takes your dad and you gotta go save him

travel in buses through space, meet weird people, travel through black holes, wear hats, play paper scissors rock, smell butt trees and find an egg for a bus driver because he lost it.

Do not play for extended periods of time, may result in brain damage.
